amendatorysection.para: Sections 29-4116 to 29-4125 shall be known and may be cited as the DNA Testing Act.

annotation.para: An action under the DNA Testing Act is a collateral attack on a conviction and is therefore similar to a postconviction action and is not part of the criminal proceeding itself. State v. Pratt, 273 Neb. 817, 733 N.W.2d 868 (2007).
